quest.name: Heroic Dreams
objectives: Speak with Alisaie at the Exarch Gate.
Use heat lures to draw out vampire bats and slay them for their fangs.
Go to the lookout in the Crystarium.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Riqi-Tio has duly delivered her grapes, as have I.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: After chatting with Arkil and Eirwel here, we came to an agreement─but I'll let them explain their request themselves.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Riqi-Tio was beaming with pride when she returned.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: It may only have been a simple task, but she won't soon forget this achievement.

dialogue.name: RIQITIO
dialogue.text: Thanks for helping with the grapes, Warrior of Darkness. In return, I promise to brew you a potion one day!

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: Riqi didn't make you drink one of her grass potions, did she?

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: Warrior of Darkness! If you've finished helping Riqi, won't you show us some fighting? Not play fighting, but honest-to-gods fighting?

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: We already have some enemies that you can deal with: vampire bats! The guards say they've become a pest around the Crystarium of late.

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: We tried to sneak outside to hunt them, but the guards caught us and sent us home... But they shouldn't mind if you were doing the fighting and we were just watching!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The children told us as much while you were away. And in preparation, Chessamile kindly furnished us with some lures for the bats.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: While the creatures won't give you any sport, bear in mind that the younglings will be watching. That's to say: put on a good show, yes?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Right, let's head outside at once. Everyone, follow me!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: A-Alisaie, wait just a─ <sigh> Come on, then, children.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I shall remain here with Riqi-Tio. The other children, I leave in your care─my unruly sister included.

dialogue.name: RIQITIO
dialogue.text: What? Everyone's going outside to see you fight? <whimper> I want to watch too...

dialogue.name: RIQITIO
dialogue.text: But...no! I have to study! I'll stay here and help Chessamile make the syrup!

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: Be careful out there, yes? But if you can't be careful, you can always come back here.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: It should be safe enough for the children here.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: We've heard the tales, but at last we can see you fight with our own eyes!

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: We've been waiting for you, Warrior of Darkness!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Everyone's here. Good. Let's get started, shall we?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: As their name suggests, vampire bats feed on blood. And originally being nocturnal creatures, they've grown more active with the return of night and become a nuisance.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: To draw them out, we'll use Chessamile's lures, which work by exploiting their heat-seeking behavior.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The bats are wont to nest under the eaves, so you are like to attract more if you place the lures near buildings.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I have here six lures─three each for you and me. As proof of a successful kill, I want you to gather up their fangs. Whoever collects the most is the winner!

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: Oh? You're hunting too?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Y-Yes, well, there's nothing like friendly competition to bring out the best in Forename!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Anyway! While we hunt the bats, the two of you are to stay with Ryne. She's really strong too, and will keep you safe.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Without further ado, then, let the contest begin!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Don't mind us. We'll be watching from a safe distance.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: I won't blink! Not even once!

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: So the bats nest under the eaves... It's important to know your enemy!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are under attack!

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: Wow! That was amazing!

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: The bats didn't stand a chance!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Well fought, Forename! The children were hanging on your every move!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: ...As was I, to be honest. Though I know the tally, may I see your fangs for good measure?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Apologies for the wait.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: My fangs. Not a bad haul, even if I do say so myself.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: ...Five, six, seven. Seven fangs from Alisaie.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: ...Which means that victory goes to Forename, who collected onetwothreefourfivesixseveneightnineten[#1]!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Bah, seems you found the better spots for the lures.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I would be lying if I said I wasn't disappointed, but you're still within reach. I'll get the better of you next time!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: ...Which means that we have a draw! Forename also collected seven fangs!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Argh, why does this feel even worse than losing? Just another measly fang and victory would have been mine!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Don't look so surprised! I've no intention of remaining lost in your wake forever, you know!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: ...Which means that victory goes to Alisaie! Forename collected onetwothreefourfivesixseveneightnineten[#1]!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hah, I did it! I bested Forename...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...In another godsdamned life! You didn't even try, did you!?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: <sigh> And there I was taking it seriously... Spare me your pity next time, will you?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...So, children─you've now seen the Warrior of Darkness in action. What are your impressions?

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: SheHe's incredible, miss! The bats were down before they knew it!

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: Our guards are strong, but the Warrior of Darkness is much, much stronger! We want to be just like herhim!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Good. If you're looking for an example to emulate, you may as well pick the best.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I want you to remember how you felt when you watched Forename, and train hard. Keep at it for long enough and you'll be strong too.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: If you don't mind telling us, when did you decide that you wanted to become Warriors of Light?

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: Well, we were there listening with everyone when Ardbert appeared, but I've wanted to be strong since before I came to the Crystarium.

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: The sin eaters killed my father and my sister, see, and I promised myself I'd learn how to protect people one day.

dialogue.name: EIRWEL
dialogue.text: Like Ardbert said, this is our home. We're the ones who have to protect it. We're the ones who have to rise up as new Warriors of Light!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: What about you, Arkil?

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: M-Me? To be honest, I'm still not sure what I want to do.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: But if my friends were in trouble, I know that I would want to help them.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: And...I want to go on adventures with them. See the world together.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: That's a wonderful goal.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: You...really think so?

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: It's hard to explain...but it's something I felt when I saw the starshower the other day.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: I felt as though...there was something I'd lost, and that I had to go out there and find it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, for the both of you, there's nothing for it but to train. When we return to the city, I'll teach you some exercises you can do by yourselves.

dialogue.name: ARKIL
dialogue.text: Thanks for showing us your fighting skills, Warrior of Darkness! We'll never forget it!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I understand how Arkil feels.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The starshower didn't awaken me to Hydaelyn's voice. But that vision of the Final Days, of Amaurot burning...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It filled me with sadness to the very pit of my being.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Things I once knew, people I once loved, promises I once made... It felt as though long-forgotten memories were dancing at the edges of my mind. But when I try to focus on them, they simply fade away.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: An effect of having a fractured soul, I shouldn't doubt. But lest you worry, I'm perfectly happy to remain fractured and have no intention of donning an Ascian mask.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: <sigh> I just wish we knew what Elidibus was plotting...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hah, but look at this pair of incurable brooders... If we're going to stand around, lost in thought, we may as well do it back in the city.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Rest assured, Ryne and I will take the children from here. Their heads will be in the clouds after meeting you, but we'll see to it their feet remain firmly planted on the ground.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It's nothing. Just a dizzy spell. Seems I tried a little too hard to beat you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm fine now, not to worry. I'll see you soon.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: As you ponder Alisaie's words, you are taken by an urge to revisit the scene of that fateful meeting...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'm so glad I found both you and the Exarch.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: The fates seem determined not to allow us a quiet moment. But come, let us have the details from Ryne.

obj.n: In the Name of the Light
